casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Yauger, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Yauger (1996), 76 Ohio St.3d 192.]

(No. 96-719 — Submitted June 4, 1996 — Decided July 31, 1996.) *193Scott J. Mastín, Tuscarawas County Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Ricky Yauger, pro se. Per Curiam.

We affirm the judgment of the court of appeals for the reasons stated in its decision.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Stratton, JJ., concur.
